item.title: My First Post
item.description: New blog in 2022 I wanted to try out a new blog theme and decided to go for the m10c theme and build my site with Hugo + Netlify + GitHub. To-do: Add content and posts, mainly walkthroughs of TryHackMe and Blue Team Labs Online CTFs.
